title: Emerald Splendor Vaddanam: A Touch of Royal Elegance
features: Floral Motif Design, featuring an emerald center stone surrounded by brilliant-cut diamonds, complemented by diamond-studded floral patterns connected with a textured gold mesh belt. Classic design elements with a modern adjustable mesh-style band for comfort and versatility.
description: A stunning blend of traditional craftsmanship and modern design. The eye-catching emerald and diamond floral design make it a statement piece. The soft gold mesh band makes the piece very comfortable, and easier to wear. A perfect family heirloom to be passed down. A true treasure to adorn.
